TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultPropertiesToSend extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定傳送 執行個體 (Instance) 以外的物件至訊息佇列時將使用的預設屬性值。

span.span: Specifies the default property values that will be used when sending objects other than instances to a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定上的訊息傳送至所選屬性的預設值。You can set default values on selected properties for messages sent to a . 用來指定預設屬性值傳送的訊息物件以外執行個體傳送至佇列，例如，字串引數傳遞至方法，在程式碼片段中， `myMessageQueue.Send("hello")`。 is used to specify default property values of the message being sent when objects other than instances are sent to a queue, for example, the string argument passed into the method in the code fragment, `myMessageQueue.Send("hello")`. 類別具有對應相同的已命名屬性中的那些所提供的值，當傳送特別執行個體。The class has corresponding, identically named properties to those in that provide the values when sending a instance specifically. 即使您已指定佇列，傳送至該佇列的物件會造成名稱相同的值屬性，以覆寫佇列的值。Even if you have specified for a queue, sending a object to that queue will cause the values for the identically named properties to override the queue's values. 您未明確設定的屬性預設建構函式，所指定的值為。Properties that you do not set explicitly default to the values specified by the constructor, . 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用訊息的優先順序，以判斷傳送訊息的預設屬性。The following code example uses the priority of a message to determine default properties to send for the message. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立的新執行個體來定義傳送至佇列不是物件的型別相關聯的預設屬性值。You can create a new instance of to define default property values to associate with objects sent to a queue that are not of type . 使用時物件執行個體是為您建立並與相關聯的成員。When working with objects, a instance is created for you and associated with the member of the . 有兩種方式可定義佇列的預設屬性，若要傳送，如下列 C# 程式碼所示。There are two ways to define a queue's default properties to send, as shown in the following C# code. 您可以設定值，這個執行個體和其關聯的佇列屬性：You can set values for this instance of and associate it with the queue's property: ``` DefaultPropertiesToSend myDefaultProperties = new DefaultPropertiesToSend(); // Set default values for the properties. myDefaultProperties.Label = "myLabel"; myDefaultProperties.Recoverable = false; ... myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend = myDefaultProperties; myMessageQueue.Send("hello"); ``` 或者，您可以個別將值指派給執行個體的直接屬性：Or, you can individually assign values to the instance's property directly: ``` myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend.Label = "myLabel"; myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend.Recoverable = false; ... myMessageQueue.Send("hello"); ``` 如果您選擇這些選項的第二，您不需要呼叫建構函式明確。If you choose the second of these options, you do not need to call the constructor explicitly. 您可能想要建立的執行個體，比方說，如果屬性的預設值取決於所傳送之訊息的某些準則。You might want to create instances of , for example, if the properties' default values depend on some criterion of the message being sent. 您可以建立多個執行個體，並指派使用者帳戶的佇列屬性，才能將訊息傳送至佇列。You can create multiple instances and assign one to the queue's property before sending the message to the queue. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeTypes.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||是長度為零的位元組的陣列A zero-length array of bytes| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes AcknowledgeType { System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes get(); void set(System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes value); };
member this.AcknowledgeType : System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要傳回至傳送的應用程式的認可訊息類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of acknowledgement message to be returned to the sending application.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 這個值是用來決定系統張貼在管理佇列的認可訊息類型，以及認可傳回至傳送的應用程式的時間。

span.span: This value is used to determine the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue and when acknowledgments are returned to the sending application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定要傳回給傳送應用程式的通知訊息的類型。The property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages to return to the sending application. 例如，設定要求通知的屬性或當訊息到達其目的地，它會擷取時，是否逾時阻止訊息到達，或從目的端佇列擷取。For example, set the property to request notification when a message reaches its destination, when it is retrieved, or whether a time-out has prevented the message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ AdministrationQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.AdministrationQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定接收由訊息佇列所產生的認可訊息的佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives acknowledgement messages generated by Message Queuing.

value.span: 指定用於系統產生認可訊息之管理佇列的 。

span.span: The that specifies the administration queue used for system-generated acknowledgment messages.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的佇列屬性可以是任何非交易式佇列。The queue specified in the property can be any non-transactional queue. 傳送至管理佇列的認可訊息可能表示原始訊息到達其目的地佇列，以及已從佇列中移除。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether or not the original message reached its destination queue, and whether or not it was removed from the queue. 當屬性中有任何值以外的其他`None`，傳送應用程式必須指定要用做為系統管理佇列的佇列。When the property has any value other than `None`, the sending application must specify the queue to be used as the administration queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AppSpecific { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.AppSpecific : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定額外的應用程式特定資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets additional, application-specific information.
Information specific to the application.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含特定應用程式之其他資訊可以用來組織不同類型的訊息，例如，使用應用程式特有的索引。The property contains additional, application-specific information that can be used to organize different types of messages, for example, using application-specific indexes. 要解譯的應用程式負責資訊。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret information. 可能的話，訊息資料應該會包含在本文的訊息，而不是在屬性。Where possible, message data should be included in the body of the message rather than in the property. 當使用外部佇列，使用屬性來指定非訊息佇列的訊息屬性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify non-Message Queuing message properties. 如同，以了解的內容的應用程式負責屬性。As with , it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AttachSenderId { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AttachSenderId : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該將傳送者識別碼附加至訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the sender ID should be attached to the message.

value.span: 如果傳送者識別碼應該附加至訊息則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if sender ID should be attached to the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寄件者識別碼是使用者的位元組陣列，表示傳送識別碼。The sender ID is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user. 寄件者識別碼由訊息佇列設定，並依接收的佇列管理員可用來驗證寄件者是否有佇列的存取權限。The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. 只有可信任，如果訊息在到達目的地佇列已驗證的寄件者識別碼。The sender ID is only trustworthy if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue. 當寄件者識別碼不會附加到訊息中時，，訊息佇列不應該驗證訊息的寄件者在傳送到目的地佇列的訊息時，表示傳送的應用程式。When the sender ID is not attached to the message, the sending application is indicating that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender when the message is sent to the destination queue. 如果目的地佇列只接受已驗證的訊息，然後或是是`false`，在到達佇列的訊息將會遭到拒絕。If the destination queue only accepts authenticated messages, and either or is `false`, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm EncryptionAlgorithm { System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm value); };
member this.EncryptionAlgorithm : System.Messaging.EncryptionAlgorithm with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來加密私用訊息主體的加密演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the body of a private message.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息是私人的它會加密再傳送並接收時解密。If a message is private, it is encrypted before it is sent and is decrypted when it is received. 屬性會指定用來加密私用訊息的訊息本文的演算法。The property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. 佇列可以要求傳入訊息必須加密。A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted. 如果未加密的 （非私用） 訊息會傳送至只接受私用訊息，佇列或私用的訊息會傳送至只接受非私用訊息佇列，佇列將會拒絕訊息。If a non-encrypted (non-private) message is sent to a queue that only accepts private messages, or if a private message is sent to a queue that only accepts non-private messages, the message is rejected by the queue. 傳送應用程式可以要求已拒絕訊息時，將會傳回傳送應用程式的負值通知訊息。The sending application can request a negative acknowledgment message be returned to the sending application if a message was rejected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Extension { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Extension : byte[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.ArrayEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定與訊息關聯的其他資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets additional information associated with the message.

value.span: 提供與訊息關聯的額外的應用程式定義資訊的位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes that provides additional, application-defined information associated with the message.

value.span: 預設值是長度為零的陣列。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供之其他應用程式定義資訊的訊息，例如大型二進位物件相關聯。The property provides for additional application-defined information that is associated with the message, such as a large binary object. 它是解譯的內容接收的應用程式的責任。It is the responsibility of the receiving application to interpret the contents of the . 可能的話，就應該包含訊息資料訊息的本文中，而不是在延伸模組。Where possible, message data should be included in the body of the message rather than in the extension. 當使用外部佇列，使用屬性來指定非訊息佇列的訊息屬性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify non-Message Queuing message properties. 在非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 通訊使用透過連接器應用程式這類佇列。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm HashAlgorithm { System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm value); };
member this.HashAlgorithm : System.Messaging.HashAlgorithm with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定當驗證訊息或建立訊息的數位簽章時所使用的雜湊演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the hashing algorithm used when authenticating messages or creating a digital signature for a message.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別訊息佇列驗證訊息時，或建立一則訊息的數位簽章時使用的雜湊演算法。The property identifies the hashing algorithm Message Queuing uses when authenticating messages or when creating a digital signature for a message. 建立訊息的數位簽章時，來源電腦上的訊息佇列會使用雜湊演算法。Message Queuing on the source computer uses the hashing algorithm when creating a digital signature for a message. 目標佇列管理員再使用相同的雜湊演算法，來驗證訊息接收時。The target Queue Manager then uses the same hashing algorithm to authenticate the message when it is received.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定描述訊息的應用程式定義字串。

span.span: Gets or sets an application-defined string that describes the message.
The label of the message.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息標籤可以用於顯示用途，比方說，或選擇性地處理訊息，根據標籤值。A message label can be used for display purposes, for example, or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 訊息標籤的最大長度為 249 的 Unicode 字元。The maximum length for a message label is 249 Unicode characters. 標籤不需要是唯一的訊息。The label does not need to be unique across messages. 訊息佇列和訊息標籤表示應用程式定義的值，可協助識別人類看得懂的詞彙中的佇列或訊息。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help to identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 它負責解譯標籤內容，應用程式它們不具有實質意義訊息佇列應用程式。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret label contents; they have no intrinsic meaning to the Message Queuing application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessagePriority Priority { System::Messaging::MessagePriority get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessagePriority value); };
member this.Priority : System.Messaging.MessagePriority with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的優先權，用來決定訊息放置在佇列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which is used to determine where the message is placed in the queue.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值，表示非異動性訊息的優先權層級。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the priority level of a non-transactional message.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響如何路由，而訊息佇列會處理訊息，以及在到達其目的地時，訊息會放在佇列中。The property affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination. 高優先權的訊息會優先使用在路由期間，而且佇列的前端插入。Higher priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the queue. 優先權相同的訊息會根據抵達時間放置在佇列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time. 非交易式訊息只能設定有意義地訊息優先順序。Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages. 交易式訊息的優先順序會自動設為`Lowest`，因而導致交易式訊息的優先權會被忽略。The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to `Lowest`, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Recoverable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當發生電腦故障或網路問題時是否保證傳遞訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

value.span: 如果在路由時會將訊息儲存至磁碟以保證訊息傳遞則為 ；如果不確保傳遞，則為 。

span.span: if the message is guaranteed delivery by saving it to disk while en route; if delivery is not assured.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否保證訊息傳遞，即使電腦損毀時的訊息目的端佇列途中。The property indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果郵件的傳遞保證，訊息會儲存在本機的路由中的每一個步驟，直到訊息成功轉送至下一步 的電腦。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step along the route until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 設定要`true`上可能會影響輸送量。Setting to `true` on could affect the throughput. 如果交易式訊息，訊息佇列會自動將訊息視為可復原，不論設為`true`。If the message is transactional, Message Queuing automatically treats the message as recoverable, regardless of whether is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ ResponseQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.ResponseQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定接收應用程式產生的回應訊息的佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

value.span: 傳回應用程式產生的回應訊息的 。

span.span: The to which application-generated response messages are returned.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別接收應用程式所產生的回應訊息傳回給傳送應用程式所接收的應用程式的佇列。The property identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are returned to the sending application by the receiving application. 當應用程式傳送訊息時所傳送的應用程式指定回應佇列。Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages. 任何可用的佇列都可以指定為回應佇列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 傳回至回應佇列的訊息是應用程式指定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 應用程式必須定義功能的訊息以及為何收到訊息時執行。The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToBeReceived { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToBeReceived : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定從目的端佇列擷取訊息的時間限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the time limit for the message to be retrieved from the destination queue.

value.span: 從目的佇列接收已傳送訊息的總秒數。

span.span: The total time, in seconds, for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定的總時間 （秒） 從目的端佇列接收已傳送的訊息。The property specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 此時間限制包含所花費的時間，到達目的地佇列，加上應用程式所擷取訊息之前佇列中的等候所花費的時間。This time limit includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application. > [!CAUTION] > 當使用依存性用戶端電腦，同步處理用戶端電腦上的時鐘，與執行訊息佇列的伺服器上的時鐘。When using dependent client computers, synchronize the clock on the client computer with the clock on the server running Message Queuing. 如果兩個時鐘未同步，當傳送訊息時，您可能會看到非預期的行為不是。If the two clocks are not synchronized, you might see unpredictable behavior when sending messages when is not . 如果間隔到期之前從佇列移除訊息，訊息佇列應用程式會捨棄訊息。If the interval expires before the message is removed from the queue, the Message Queuing application discards the message. 訊息是傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列中，如果訊息的屬性設定為`true`，或略過是`false`。The message is either sent to the dead-letter queue, if the message's property is set to `true`, or ignored, if is `false`. 如果是小於，會優先使用。If is less than , takes precedence. 訊息的屬性可以設定為要求的訊息佇列傳送負值通知訊息傳回給傳送應用程式如果在計時器終止前，不會擷取訊息。The message's property can be set to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message is not retrieved before the timer expires. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您已經指定接收負值通知，您將不會收到時的值的值少於。If you have specified to receive negative acknowledgments, you will not receive them when the value of is less than the value of . 在交易中傳送數個訊息，訊息佇列會使用值的第一個訊息屬性。When several messages are sent in a transaction, Message Queuing uses the value of the first message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToReachQueue { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToReachQueue : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息到達佇列的時間限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the time limit for the message to reach the queue.

value.span: 從傳送訊息的時間至訊息到達目的端佇列的時間限制 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time limit in seconds for a message to reach the destination queue, from the time the message is sent.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果間隔到期，在訊息抵達其目的地之前，訊息佇列應用程式會捨棄訊息。If the interval expires before the message reaches its destination, the Message Queuing application discards the message. 訊息是傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列中，如果訊息的屬性設定為`true`，或略過是`false`。The message is either sent to the dead-letter queue, if the message's property is set to `true`, or ignored, if is `false`. 如果大於，會優先使用。If is greater than , takes precedence. 訊息的屬性可以設定為要求的訊息佇列傳送負值通知訊息傳回給傳送應用程式如果在計時器終止前未到達的訊息。The message's property can be set to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message does not arrive before the timer expires. 如果為 0 秒、 訊息佇列一次嘗試將訊息傳送至其目的地上，如果佇列正等待訊息。If is 0 seconds, Message Queuing tries once to send the message to its destination if the queue is waiting for the message. 如果本機佇列，訊息永遠會到達佇列。If the queue is local, the message always reaches the queue. 在交易中傳送數個訊息，訊息佇列會使用值的第一個訊息屬性。When several messages are sent in a transaction, Message Queuing uses the value of the first message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ TransactionStatusQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.TransactionStatusQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 取得來源電腦上的異動狀態佇列。

span.span: Gets the transaction status queue on the source computer.

value.span: 來源電腦上的異動狀態佇列，用來傳回認可訊息至傳送的應用程式。

span.span: The transaction status queue on the source computer, which is used for sending acknowledgement messages back to the sending application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別來源電腦上的異動狀態佇列。The property identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer. 屬性由訊息佇列、 設定和擷取交易式傳送至外部佇列的訊息時，由連接器應用程式。The property is set by Message Queuing, and is used by connector applications when retrieving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue. 在非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft Message Queuing 通訊使用透過連接器應用程式這類佇列。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. 連接器應用程式可以使用的異動狀態佇列來傳送通知訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。The connector application can use the transaction status queue to send acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 即使傳送的應用程式不會要求其他認可的交易狀態應該會收到這些通知。The transaction status queue should receive these acknowledgments even if the sending application does not request other acknowledgments.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseAuthentication : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出訊息在傳送之前是否必須通過驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message must be authenticated before being sent.

value.span: 如果傳送的應用程式要求訊息的驗證則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the sending application requested authentication for the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定訊息是否需要進行驗證。The property specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 如果傳送應用程式要求驗證時，訊息佇列會建立數位簽章，並使用簽章訊息，傳送，並驗證時收到的訊息。If the sending application requests authentication, Message Queuing creates a digital signature and uses it to sign the message when it is sent and to authenticate the message when it is received. 如果到達佇列時，如果訊息傳送至佇列只接受已驗證的訊息，將會拒絕訊息設為`false`。If a message is sent to a queue that only accepts authenticated messages, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue if is set to `false`. 您不可能以查看訊息的屬性並判斷訊息是否通過驗證。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 驗證失敗的訊息都會被捨棄，並不會傳遞至佇列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDeadLetterQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseDeadLetterQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該將無法傳遞的訊息複本傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.

value.span: 如果訊息傳遞錯誤會導致將訊息複本傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if message delivery failure should result in a copy of the message being sent to a dead-letter queue; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和指定訊息佇列將會如何追蹤訊息。 and specify how Message Queuing will track a message. 如果是`true`，則訊息傳送至非異動式寄不出信件佇列無法傳遞訊息 （例如，如果郵件計時器過期） 的電腦上 （適用於非交易式訊息） 的傳遞失敗，發生。If is `true`, then in case of delivery failure (for non-transactional messages), the message is sent to the non-transactional dead-letter queue on the computer that could not deliver the message (for example, if a message timer expires). 如果交易式訊息的傳遞失敗，訊息會傳送至異動式寄不出信件佇列中所有負數且不確定的情況下在來源電腦上。In the case of delivery failure for transactional messages, the message is sent to the transactional dead-letter queue on the source computer in all negative and in-doubt cases. 當您將訊息儲存在寄不出信件佇列中時，空的定期以移除不再需要的訊息佇列。When you store messages in a dead-letter queue, empty the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 在寄不出信件佇列對佇列所在的電腦的大小配額的計數中儲存的訊息。Messages stored in dead-letter queues count against the size quota for the computer where the queue resides. 電腦配額由系統管理員所設定，而是指配置來儲存訊息的電腦上，不只是在單一佇列的總大小。The computer quota is set by the administrator and refers to the total size allocated for storing messages on a computer, not just in a single queue. 您不想建立日誌或寄不出信件佇列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 這些是由訊息佇列會產生這兩個系統佇列。These are both system queues that are generated by Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseEncryption { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseEncryption : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將訊息設成私用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make the message private.

value.span: 如果要求訊息佇列為訊息加密則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to require Message Queuing to encrypt the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息是私人的之後才能傳送和接收時，會解密加密其主體。If a message is private, its body is encrypted before it is sent and is decrypted when it is received. 若要傳送的私用訊息，傳送應用程式必須指定用於加密和 （選擇性） 若要套用何種加密演算法。To send a private message, the sending application must specify that encryption be used and, optionally, which encryption algorithm to apply. 傳送私人訊息時，它不需要您的應用程式執行訊息加密。When sending private messages, it is not necessary that your application perform the message encryption. 時，訊息佇列可以加密訊息本文為您應用程式傳送的訊息在 Microsoft Windows 2000 企業沒有目錄服務的存取權。Message Queuing can encrypt the message body for you when your application sends messages within a Microsoft Windows 2000 enterprise where there is access to the directory service. 接收私用的訊息時，它一律是接收佇列管理員來解密訊息內文。When receiving private messages, it is always the receiving Queue Manager that decrypts the message body.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseJournalQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出訊息複本是否應保留在原始電腦上的電腦日誌中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.

value.span: 表示訊息成功地從原始電腦傳輸至下一個步驟後，要求在原始電腦的電腦日誌中保留訊息的複本，否則為 。

span.span: to require that a copy of a message be kept in the originating computer's machine journal after it has been successfully transmitted from the originating computer to the next step; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和指定訊息佇列將會如何追蹤訊息。 and specify how Message Queuing will track a message. 如果是`true`，然後在每個步驟中，訊息會傳輸，複本保留在原始電腦上電腦日誌中。If is `true`, then at each step that a message is transmitted, a copy is kept in the computer journal on the originating computer. 如果目的地佇列是在遠端電腦上，傳送的訊息只複製到日誌佇列。The sent message will only be copied to the journal queue if the destination queue is on a remote computer. 如果目的地是在本機電腦上，訊息會直接傳送至佇列沒有任何需要的日誌功能的中繼步驟。If the destination is on the local computer, the message is sent directly to the queue; there are no intermediate steps to require journaling. 當您將訊息儲存在日誌佇列時，空的定期以移除不再需要的訊息佇列。When you store messages in a journal queue, empty the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 計算儲存在日誌佇列的佇列所在的電腦配額的訊息 （由系統管理員設定電腦配額）。Messages stored in journal queues count against the quota for the computer where the queue resides (the computer quota is set by the administrator). 您不想建立日誌或寄不出信件佇列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 這些是由訊息佇列會產生這兩個系統佇列。These are both system queues that are generated by Message Queuing. 訊息與佇列可以指定的日誌功能。Journaling can be specified by both the message and the queue. 當是`true`，日誌的訊息是傳送。When is `true`, the message is journaled when it is sent. 當是`true`，日誌的訊息是接收時。When is `true`, the message is journaled when it is received.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當訊息向其目的佇列移動時是否要追蹤訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to trace a message as it moves toward its destination queue.

value.span: 如果原始訊息路由至目的佇列的每個中間步驟都會產生要傳送至系統報告佇列的報告，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if each intermediate step made by the original message en route to the destination queue will generate a report to be sent to the system's report queue; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否要向其目的佇列移動追蹤之訊息的路由。The property specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`，訊息佇列所產生的報告訊息傳送至報告佇列，每次訊息傳遞到訊息佇列路由伺服器。If `true`, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to a report queue each time the message passes through a Message Queuing routing server. 來源佇列管理員所指定的報告佇列。The report queue is specified by the source Queue Manager. 報告佇列並不限於訊息佇列所產生的報告訊息。Report queues are not limited to Message Queuing-generated report messages. 您應用程式所產生的訊息可以傳送至報告佇列以及。Your application-generated messages can be sent to report queues as well. 使用追蹤，牽涉到設定 Active Directory，並指定訊息佇列企業版的報告佇列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 系統管理員會設定這些設定。These settings are configured by the administrator.
